ai-tha-ap287:0.3_0: He was guided by those senior monks, and song.
ai-tha-ap287:1.1_0: “I’ve missed on the bank of the rivers,
ai-tha-ap287:1.2_0: aspiring to the level of the bad.
ai-tha-ap287:2.1_0: Seeing the joy of the Dhamma,
ai-tha-ap287:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap287:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap287:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Makhādeva Mango Grove.
ai-tha-ap287:6.1_0: This was the fifth opportunity to lead the senior.
